data.name: Astrolander
data.detailed_description:
Astrolander is a fast-paced twist-filled local co-op game inspired by Lunar Lander! 2 players control 1 rocket: 1 player fires thrusters, the other controls rotation. Special abilities are split between the players: slowing down time, a cloak, & a cargo hook. Pilot a variety of rad rocket ships while solving challenging puzzles, whizzing your way around obstacles, & dodging enemies including UFOs, turrets, & comets. Test your skills & your friendships!

LOCAL CO-OP
Play alone on a distant planet or team up with crewmates for an innovative co-op experience!

data.short_description: Astrolander is a fast-paced twist-filled local co-op game inspired by Lunar Lander! 2 players control 1 rocket: Use thrusters, rotation, & special abilities to solve puzzles, whiz around obstacles, & dodge enemies. Test your skills & your friendships!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
